message.body: My dads getting worse and they still don't know what it is. I'd like to stay another day but I can come back if you think that's better. I know that it's important that I'm there too so let me know.
Let me know if I should come back bc I can.
Giel been meaning to ck on u..no stay it is more important u there..we will b fine..mayb we c u monday if not whenever y get back..hope he be ok..take care
